title: Home / Landing Page
content: The main entry point for DevNexus. Provides an overview of AI-driven roadmaps, student success stories, and quick access to login or registration.

title: Login Page
content: Secure authentication portal for students and administrators. Supports email/password login and password recovery options.

title: Registration Page
content: Sign-up page for new users. Requires student ID, email, and password to create a DevNexus account.

title: Student Dashboard
content: The central command center. Users can view their active progress, access 'My Roadmaps', and see quick stats about their learning velocity.

title: Roadmap Generator Tool
content: The core tool for creating new learning paths. Supports two modes: 'General' for career-based skill gaps and 'Academic' for university course alignment.

title: My Roadmaps Library
content: A repository of all roadmaps the student has generated. Shows completion percentage and allows resuming specific paths.

title: User Profile & Skill Matrix
content: Displays the user's 'Skill Matrix' (visual bars of skill levels), bio, and role. Includes an 'Edit' button to update personal details.

title: Profile Settings
content: Configuration area to change display name, target career role, update passwords, and manage account security.

title: System Protocols (Terms of Service)
content: Legal terms covering Access Control, Data Integrity, and System Stability. Users must acknowledge these protocols to use the system.

title: Intellectual Property & Copyright
content: Details ownership of the DevNexus source code, user-generated data rights, and third-party asset licenses.

title: AI Assistant Help
content: Guide on how to use the floating AI chatbot to navigate the website and ask questions about courses.

title: Course: Probability & Stats (DEK3023)
content: Syllabus for DEK3023. Covers Hypothesis Testing, Linear Regression, SPSS, and Probability Modeling.

title: Course: Numerical Methods (DEK3033)
content: Syllabus for DEK3033. Covers Root-Finding Algorithms, Linear Algebra Solvers, and MATLAB computing.

title: Course: Courseware Design (DEP3013)
content: Syllabus for DEP3013. Covers Instructional Design Models (ADDIE), UI/UX Storyboarding, and Figma prototyping.

title: Course: Models of Instruction (DEP3023)
content: Syllabus for DEP3023. Focuses on Blended Learning, Flipped Classrooms, and Curriculum Analysis.

title: Course: Courseware Engineering (DEP3063)
content: Syllabus for DEP3063. Covers Agile Methodology, Waterfall Model, and Android App Development for education.

title: Course: Software Project Management (DEQ3063)
content: Syllabus for DEQ3063. Covers Gantt Charts, Risk Management, COCOMO estimation, and Jira tracking.

title: Course: Configuration Management (DEQ3093)
content: Syllabus for DEQ3093. Covers Git Version Control, CI/CD Pipelines, and Change Control Boards.

title: Course: Software Design (DES3043)
content: Syllabus for DES3043. Covers Microservices, Design Patterns, RESTful API Design, and Software Architecture.

title: Course: Requirements Engineering (DES3023)
content: Syllabus for DES3023. Covers UML Modeling, SRS Documentation, and Requirements Elicitation techniques.

title: Course: Software Engineering Principles (DES3013)
content: Syllabus for DES3013. Introduction to SDLC, Waterfall vs Agile, and basic UML diagrams.

title: Course: Software Project (DES3073)
content: Syllabus for DES3073. Capstone project course involving Full-Stack Development, Laravel, and Defensive Programming.

title: Course: Testing & Quality (DES3053)
content: Syllabus for DES3053. Covers Black-box testing, White-box testing, Selenium automation, and Unit Testing.

title: Course: Software Processes (DES3083)
content: Syllabus for DES3083. Deep dive into Scrum, Kanban, XP, and Software Process Improvement (SPI).

title: Course: Validation & Verification (DES3103)
content: Syllabus for DES3103. Covers IEEE Standards, Code Inspections, and CMM Maturity Models.

title: Course: Mobile App Dev (DES3113)
content: Syllabus for DES3113. Focuses on Flutter, Dart, Firebase integration, and Widget lifecycles.

title: Course: Computer Networks (DTN3023)
content: Syllabus for DTN3023. Covers OSI Model, TCP/IP, Packet Tracer, and IP Addressing.

title: Course: Operating Systems (DTN3043)
content: Syllabus for DTN3043. Covers Process Management, Memory Paging, Deadlocks, and Linux Command Line.

title: Course: Structured Programming (DTS3013)
content: Syllabus for DTS3013. Introduction to C++, Pointers, Arrays, and Algorithm Logic.

title: Course: Object Oriented Programming (DTS3093)
content: Syllabus for DTS3093. Covers Java, Polymorphism, Inheritance, and Encapsulation.

title: Career: Frontend Engineer
content: Career path focusing on Vue.js, React, CSS3, Accessibility, and Responsive Design.

title: Career: Backend Architect
content: Career path focusing on Database Design, Microservices, API Development, and Cloud Scaling.

title: Career: DevOps Specialist
content: Career path focusing on CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and Infrastructure as Code.

title: Career: Mobile Developer
content: Career path focusing on Flutter, React Native, iOS, Android, and mobile UI paradigms.

title: Career: Data Scientist
content: Career path focusing on Python, Pandas, Machine Learning, and Statistical Analysis.

title: Skill: Vue.js
content: Resource page for Vue.js. Learn Composition API, Pinia State Management, and Vite.

title: Skill: Laravel
content: Resource page for Laravel. Learn Eloquent ORM, Blade Templating, and Sanctum Authentication.

title: Skill: Python
content: Resource page for Python. Learn syntax, data structures, and automation scripts.

title: Skill: SQL
content: Resource page for SQL. Learn relational databases, joins, normalization, and stored procedures.

title: Skill: Git
content: Resource page for Git. Learn branching, merging, pull requests, and version control best practices.

title: Skill: Docker
content: Resource page for Docker. Learn containerization, Dockerfiles, and Docker Compose.

title: Skill: Figma
content: Resource page for Figma. Learn UI prototyping, design systems, and wireframing.

title: Skill: Agile/Scrum
content: Resource page for Agile. Learn Sprint planning, Stand-ups, and Project Management.

title: Skill: Testing (QA)
content: Resource page for Software Testing. Learn Unit Tests, Integration Tests, and TDD.

title: Skill: Networking
content: Resource page for Computer Networks. Learn TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP, and Security.

title: Roadmap Phase: Foundation
content: The starting phase of most roadmaps. Focuses on setting up environments and learning basic syntax.

title: Roadmap Phase: Core Logic
content: The second phase of roadmaps. Focuses on algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving.

title: Roadmap Phase: Frameworks
content: The intermediate phase. Focuses on modern tools like Vue, React, Laravel, or Django.

title: Roadmap Phase: Deployment
content: The advanced phase. Focuses on cloud hosting, CI/CD pipelines, and production security.

title: Roadmap Phase: Capstone
content: The final phase. Focuses on building a complete portfolio project to demonstrate mastery.

title: Blog: How to Start Coding
content: A guide for beginners on choosing a language and setting up an IDE.

title: Blog: Top 5 Frameworks 2026
content: Analysis of the most popular web frameworks including Vue 3 and Next.js.

title: Blog: Why Learn Laravel?
content: Article explaining the benefits of Laravel's ecosystem for PHP developers.

title: Blog: AI in Education
content: How DevNexus uses LLMs to personalize learning experiences for students.

title: Blog: Mastering CSS Grid
content: Tutorial on building complex layouts using modern CSS Grid techniques.

title: FAQ: Password Reset
content: Instructions on how to reset your password if you are locked out.

title: FAQ: Delete Account
content: Procedure for permanently deleting your DevNexus account and data.

title: FAQ: Academic Credits
content: Information on how DevNexus roadmaps align with university credit hours.

title: Feature: PDF Export
content: DevNexus allows you to export your completed roadmaps as PDF certificates.

title: Feature: Dark Mode
content: How to toggle the interface between Light and Dark Teal themes.

title: Admin: User Management
content: Admin panel for managing registered students and system access.

title: Admin: System Health
content: Admin dashboard showing AI model status (Ollama) and API latency.

content: Technical documentation for the DevNexus public API endpoints.

content: Manage email and push notification preferences for roadmap updates.

content: Control visibility of your profile and roadmaps to other students.

content: A tool to generate a tech-focused resume based on your completed roadmaps.

content: Submit details about software errors or glitches found in the system.
